byline.contributor: Christine Hauser contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Rachelle Dee Bond and Michael P McCarthy are arraigned in Boston in relation to death of Bond's daughter, Bella Amoroso Bond, who was roughly two and a half years old; McCarthy was charged with murder and Bond as an accessory after the fact.
lead_paragraph: Rachelle Dee Bond and her companion, Michael Patrick McCarthy, pleaded not guilty Monday in the death of Ms. Bond’s daughter, Bella, whose body was found in June.

headline.main: Details Emerge in Massachusetts ‘Baby Doe’ Case as Couple Are Arraigned
headline.print_headline: Details Emerge About Massachusetts Toddler’s Death as Couple Are Arraigned

snippet: Rachelle Dee Bond and her companion, Michael Patrick McCarthy, pleaded not guilty Monday in the death of Ms. Bond’s daughter, Bella, whose body was found in June.
